com.apple.mrj.jdirect
Class GenericHandle

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.apple.mrj.jdirect.GenericHandle
public class GenericHandle
extends Object

GenericHandle is a wrapper around a platform dependent Handle pointer. No range checking is performed on this memory.

Field Summary
protected  int handle
          The data for this Data is stored in the MacOS heap.
 
Constructor Summary
GenericHandle(int handle)
          Construct a GenericHandle which wraps arbitrary platform memory

Field Detail

handle

protected int handle
The data for this Data is stored in the MacOS heap. This int holds the MacOS Handle to arbitrary data.
